name: Ellen Helton
text: This summer was our first experience with Soccer Shots and it was a really great one. My 3 and 5 year olds each did a week of summer camp and loved it. The coaches did a great job at connecting with the kids while also teaching soccer skills. Such a positive experience and we are looking forward to signing up for the fall season soon!

name: Ellen Helton
text: This summer was our first experience with Soccer Shots and it was a really great one. My 3 and 5 year olds each did a week of summer camp and loved it. The coaches did a great job at connecting with the kids while also teaching soccer skills. Such a positive experience and we are looking forward to signing up for the fall season soon!

name: Meredith Horst
text: Great sports fields and facilities. Amenities include Walking track,playground,concessions and clean bathrooms. Gardendale soccer club hosts competent and caring coaches. Fun for all the players and families. We enjoy being part of this community.

name: C J K
text: Very nice facilities. My son had a night game there, lighting could be improved, it was kind of hard to see the players from across the field. It almost felt like they only had half the lights on but all were on.

name: Jeremy Pitts
text: Great family fun!!!

name: Jennifer Fivas
text: Such a great field run by the nicest people.  Love that they have concessions available.

name: Jennifer Maddox
text: The best part about it is how friendly people are. It's like one big family and we've always felt welcomed here. The coaches are great and know their stuff!

name: Brit Spy
text: My nephew played soccer here last year and we had such z great experience at his games that we're started our soon this year!

name: Sheila Bryan
text: Great place to watch your grandkids play soccer. Big field, and great food. plenty of parking.

name: Sean Boles
text: Great fields and great people! 👍

name: Patrick Ridgway
text: Great place to play with the kids. Plus there is a playgrounds and a sprinkler park

name: sammy mburu
text: Great atmosphere with great coaches.....

name: Taylor Harris
text: Great time here with everyone. Parents, Coaches, and the Club's staff are wonderful to be around.

name: ALICIA SEARCY
text: It's a great place to walk, run, hike & clear a busy mind.

name: Kasandra Peacock
text: People are friendly and very helpful, fun playground for kids, nice and clean field.

name: Sherry T
text: Great soccer training area

name: Bin Truong
text: Nice fields but it is nothing when you are not allowed to play

name: John Speights
text: Many fields with a long walking track. Also has a playground and splash pad adjacent.

name: Barry Craiger
text: Great park!

name: Steven Coonts
text: Fun for the kids

name: Tim Griffin
text: Nice fields

name: Nena S100
text: Kids love it!!!!!

name: Craig Stults
text: I can't say enough about how awesome these guys are. I have played in all their tournaments since '07. They really take care of the teams and fans. It's a fantastic experience!! I have played in adult tournaments all over the country and this is one of the best!! Hands down!!! If you get a chance to play in the winter or summer tournaments....DO IT!! Don't miss out!

name: Andrew Murray
text: Great experience! Very well organized tournament.

name: Craig Stults
text: One of the best tournaments in the southeast!!! Great people and an awesome time!

name: David Darby
text: Those boys put on a good show. Grass fields are high rate! Super job
